Netflix | Senior Software Engineer | Los Gatos, CA | ONSITE

Help us manage the global steering and scaling of Netflix control plane. We make it so that we can fight production fires after evacuating the building. While regional evacuation is our most visible offering, we also drive projects that balance availability, latency and cost in the nominal case as well. We're open to a variety of engineering backgrounds and don't require previous domain expertise.

Job Description: https://jobs.netflix.com/jobs/866321

How your technical skills will be evaluated: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/interviewing-demand-engineeri...

What is Demand Engineering: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/what-demand-engineering-aaron...
